mapper.select: SELECT id, customer_id, credit_limit, available_limit, principal_outstanding, interest_outstanding, version, created_at, updated_at FROM loan_account WHERE customer_id = #{customerId}
mapper.update: UPDATE loan_account SET credit_limit = #{creditLimit}, available_limit = #{availableLimit}, principal_outstanding = #{principalOutstanding}, interest_outstanding = #{interestOutstanding}, version = version + 1, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id} AND version = #{version}
